name: Cheater Cheater v2
description:
A bug-free version of our submission for At0m Gamejam 2. Theme was "You need to cheat to win."

Try to beat the dungeon with cheat codes you gather around, but don't get caught cheating while the Eye is observing you!

Controls:

Space - Jump
Ctrl - Dodge
Alt - Fire
Shift - Hold to enter the cheat codes you gather
E - Bribe
